page.title: 15DENTISTS IN BURWELL.
page.content: There is a{dental practice}in the village.It has been at 25 Ness Road {since November 1982.}There are 4 dentists and they have three assistants.They vary in where they work though, sometimes in Newmarket and Mildenhall as well as Burwell. The dentist sees his patients about every six months.People's main problems are{tooth-decay}through eating too many sweet things and not enough fruit.He may see thirty patients a day and about 150 during the week. Children get free treatment in the {National Health Scheme}but adults must pay some of the cost themselves.
